title: can't buy items
body: during battle, i'd have around 3000 coins but when I try to buy items with it, the 'buy' button is like faded so I can't click it therefore I cannot buy anything. does ANYONE kmow why??

replies.body: You won't be able to purchase shop items if you're too far away.  Definitely make sure you're at the shop to purchase items, or while respawning.  Let me know if that clears things up!
